Title: Simple CRM 4 Silverlight Application
Description: A simple demonstration of code that can be used to connect to CRM 4 via Windows Integrated or IFD authentication modes, and via HTTP or HTTPS.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple demonstration of code that can be used to connect to CRM 4 via Windows Integrated or IFD authentication modes, and via HTTP or HTTPS.

For instructions on assembling the project, visit my blog post describing the process at: http://crmentropy.blogspot.com/2011/07/silverlight-and-crm-4-continued.html
